channel.title: [Server!]Server Manager v1[Server!]
channel.description:
[b][size=30pt]Server Manager v1 Release![/size][/b] Hello I am Zaft/Lilpeatrie I am a Language coder
I am releasing An Updated Version Of the Server Manager v0.1 also Requested [quote="CarScape, post:2, topic:289897"]good job , keep up good work but pick up some new ideas restarters are kinda old now any1 can do it , do new stuff :P[/quote]
Download [size=20pt][b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?2rqztlwkyjq]Here[/url][/b][/size]
Features: [CODE] Server Restarter v1 Java Coder v1 Compiler v1 Stable Core Managed Source [/CODE]
Pics [IMG]http://i206.photobucket.com/albums/bb61/7axejax7/s1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i206.photobucket.com/albums/bb61/7axejax7/s2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i206.photobucket.com/albums/bb61/7axejax7/s3.jpg[/img]
If you have any question or Request pm me!
Credits: zaft/lilpeatrie 100%

item.title: [Server!]Server Manager v1[Server!]
item.dc:creator: @lilpeatrie lilpeatrie
item.description:
@lilpeatrie wrote:

TabbyKiller:

VB is the Simplest Programme from what ive Heard.

Yes, Vb is very simple to use but when it comes down to the real coding part it gets harder
this is a simple application the only thing that is actually hard that I have added is the core.
the core allows the application to run the server under its process unlike most auto restarters that just run the program, my core helps the application manage the process from crashing like if u had a syi attack or something
instead of the program crashing it simple restarts it there for keeping your computer / Dedicated server safe
from harm & keeps your server running :D.

Also key loggers and all thous things are simple applications that have been spread across the internet.
But stuff like cores and bases are not that easy to code the core i have used for this application is about
574 lines and has never been used before but yes vb is very simple

Thanks for your comment

Read full topic

item.title: [Server!]Server Manager v1[Server!]
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“lilpeatrie, post:5, topic:289979”][quote author=gunz4life link=topic=383308.msg2877909#msg2877909 date=1248150892]

Has this been released before?

No it has Not, I am one of the few at this community that can probably code vb.
Your probable thinking of the ipanel witch is a java application this is a .exe application

Alot of people now how use VB. But nice release.
[/quote]

Just because they can use it doesn’t mean they can code it

  • i coded in a custom core…:D[/quote]
    Its actually not hard to code it:P, alot of people can code, keyloggers/rats/viruses with them, and theres tons of tuts, i’m sure its not that hard, but maybe. I rarely try to use VB since i get bored, and have no clue what to make. But from your post, you gave me a idea:P, i’ll rep, and its very helpful.

Read full topic
